title: Soo i found an app called LOLSUMO
body: I found LOLSUMO and i want to ask can i get banned for using it ?

replies.body:
Can you explain what LOLSumo is please? Then I hopefully can determine wether using it can result in a ban, or not!

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Basically, 1 hour or so after the end of each game it gives you a performance rated from bronze to challenger (bronze being the worst. Challenger being the best) You can also register 3 friends and 3 pro players to be able to see their performance. It gives you your lane matchup and tips based on your opponent champion and summoner spell. You can pay 5 $/month (yearly) or 12 $ (monthly) to get acess to more graphs per example: lane pressure.

I saw an ad for this app the other day. It seems like it only grabs data from the Riot API and specifically gives you advice on the match. Since it doesn't go on your PC, I don't see much harm it could do, but keep in mind that all third-party apps are under a [**use at your own risk**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) category. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
